scripts.build:android:stg: ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=com.shakebugs:shake-staging && yarn run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease
scripts.build:android:prd: ANDROID_DEPENDENCY=com.shakebugs:shake && yarn run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease
scripts.build:ios:stg: IOS_DEPENDENCY=Shake-Staging && yarn run clean:ios && yarn run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme Staging -configuration StagingRelease 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.build:ios:prd: IOS_DEPENDENCY=Shake && yarn run clean:ios && yarn run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace example.xcworkspace -scheme Production -configuration ProductionRelease 'COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO' -archivePath example.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath example.xcarchive -exportPath ./ -exportOptionsPlist ../export_options.plist
scripts.clean:ios: IOS_DEPENDENCY=Shake-Staging && rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
